languages.text: "Исцеление глубоких или застарелых ран с помощью биомантии занимает время. Это медленный, кропотливый процесс. Особенно если надо выращивать новую ткань".

traits.locale_text: "Исцеление глубоких или застарелых ран с помощью биомантии занимает время. Это медленный, кропотливый процесс. Особенно если надо выращивать новую ткань".

languages.text: "Healing deep or old injuries using biomancy takes time. It's a slow, painstaking process. Especially if you have to grow new tissue."
languages.original_text: "Исцеление глубоких или застарелых ран с помощью биомантии занимает время. Это медленный, кропотливый процесс. Особенно если надо выращивать новую ткань".

traits.locale_text: "Healing deep or old injuries using biomancy takes time. It's a slow, painstaking process. Especially if you have to grow new tissue."
"Healing deep or old injuries using biomancy takes time. It's a slow, painstaking process. Especially if you have to grow new tissue."
"Healing deep or old injuries using biomancy takes time. It's a slow, painstaking process. Especially if you have to grow new tissue."
"Healing deep or old injuries using biomancy takes time. It's a slow, painstaking process. Especially if you have to grow new tissue."

languages.text: “用生物法术治疗旧伤或很深的伤口，要花很长时间。这是个缓慢而艰苦的过程，尤其当身体需要长出新组织时，更是如此。”
languages.original_text: "Healing deep or old injuries using biomancy takes time. It's a slow, painstaking process. Especially if you have to grow new tissue."

traits.locale_text: “用生物法术治疗旧伤或很深的伤口，要花很长时间。这是个缓慢而艰苦的过程，尤其当身体需要长出新组织时，更是如此。”

languages.text: «Curar heridas viejas con biomancia es un proceso largo y meticuloso que requiere su tiempo. Especialmente para hacer crecer tejidos nuevos».
languages.original_text: "Healing deep or old injuries using biomancy takes time. It's a slow, painstaking process. Especially if you have to grow new tissue."

traits.locale_text: «Curar heridas viejas con biomancia es un proceso largo y meticuloso que requiere su tiempo. Especialmente para hacer crecer tejidos nuevos».

languages.text: 「生体秘法で深い傷や古い傷を治すには時間がかかるうえに骨の折れる作業だ。特に新しい組織を育てなければならない場合はな」
languages.original_text: "Healing deep or old injuries using biomancy takes time. It's a slow, painstaking process. Especially if you have to grow new tissue."

traits.locale_text: 「生体秘法で深い傷や古い傷を治すには時間がかかるうえに骨の折れる作業だ。特に新しい組織を育てなければならない場合はな」

languages.text: « Il faut un certain temps pour soigner les blessures graves à l'aide de la biomancie. C'est un processus lent et laborieux, surtout lorsqu'il est nécessaire de générer de nouveaux tissus. »
languages.original_text: "Healing deep or old injuries using biomancy takes time. It's a slow, painstaking process. Especially if you have to grow new tissue."

traits.locale_text: « Il faut un certain temps pour soigner les blessures graves à l'aide de la biomancie. C'est un processus lent et laborieux, surtout lorsqu'il est nécessaire de générer de nouveaux tissus. »

languages.text: "Tiefe oder alte Verletzungen mittels Biomantie zu heilen braucht Zeit. Es ist ein langsamer, mühsamer Prozess. Insbesondere wenn neues Gewebe nachwachsen muss."
languages.original_text: "Healing deep or old injuries using biomancy takes time. It's a slow, painstaking process. Especially if you have to grow new tissue."

traits.locale_text: "Tiefe oder alte Verletzungen mittels Biomantie zu heilen braucht Zeit. Es ist ein langsamer, mühsamer Prozess. Insbesondere wenn neues Gewebe nachwachsen muss."

languages.text: "Biyobazlık kullanarak derin ya da eski yaraları iyileştirmek zaman alıyor. Yavaş ve zahmetli bir süreç. Hele ki yeni dokular üretmen gerekiyorsa..."
languages.original_text: "Healing deep or old injuries using biomancy takes time. It's a slow, painstaking process. Especially if you have to grow new tissue."
